program main

    implicit none

    character(len=100000) :: S
    integer :: N
    integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: mod_arr
    integer, dimension(2019) :: mod_cnt
    integer :: radix, tmp, digit, ans1, i, j
    character(len=20) :: str_ans1, str_ans2
    integer :: max_stack = 100000
    character(len=1), dimension(max_stack) :: stack
    integer :: top, c, ans2
    character(len=1) :: first_char, result_char

    ! First program's logic
    read(*, '(a)') S
    N = len_trim(S)
    allocate(mod_arr(1:N))
    mod_cnt = 0
    radix = 1

    do i = 1, N
        ! Get the character from the end
        tmp = ichar(S(N - i + 1)) - ichar('0')
        digit = tmp
        tmp = mod(digit * radix, 2019)
        if (i > 1) then
            tmp = mod(tmp + mod_arr(i-1), 2019)
        end if
        mod_arr(i) = tmp
        mod_cnt(tmp + 1) = mod_cnt(tmp + 1) + 1
        radix = mod(radix * 10, 2019)
    end do

    mod_cnt(1) = mod_cnt(1) + 1  ! mod 0's count is increased by 1 (empty prefix)
    ans1 = 0
    do j = 1, 2019
        ans1 = ans1 + mod_cnt(j) * (mod_cnt(j) - 1) / 2
    end do

    deallocate(mod_arr)

    ! Convert ans1 to string for second program
    write(str_ans1, '(i0)') ans1
    str_ans1 = adjustl(str_ans1)

    ! Second program's logic
    top = 0
    c = 0
    do i = 1, len_trim(str_ans1)
        character(len=1) :: current_char = str_ans1(i:i)
        top = top + 1
        stack(top) = current_char
        do while (top >= 2)
            character(len=1) :: p = stack(top)
            character(len=1) :: q = stack(top - 1)
            if ((p == '0' .and. q == '1') .or. (p == '1' .and. q == '0')) then
                c = c + 1
                top = top - 2
            else
                exit
            end if
        end do
    end do

    ans2 = 2 * c

    ! Third program's logic
    write(str_ans2, '(i0)') ans2
    str_ans2 = adjustl(str_ans2)
    first_char = str_ans2(1:1)
    result_char = char(ichar(first_char) + 1)
    write(*, '(a)') result_char

end program main
